channel.title: Wtf why does def do this
channel.description: Okay so people train def and it says they got 99 def and you can't hit ANYTHING with def how do i fix it?

item.title: Wtf why does def do this
item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

the way most servers are configured is they calculate how high you hit based on a simple math formula that can very. but most base hit power on strength and a little on attack. you would have to go through…probably the player.java or playerhandler.java not sure which. and find the math formula that calculates hits.

btw. dont try and bump up your posts with two accounts.

and he means that even in rs if you attack with the defense skill and have a def of 99 you still hit 1s. and its all as i said above

Read full topic
item.source: Wtf why does def do this

item.title: Wtf why does def do this

item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

I’m not getting this? Def hasn’t gotten the ability to hit on real RS. Or do you mean people can’t hit against it?!
